about_the_game:
SpaceRace is a futuristic 3D Zero-G racing game where players compete to set the best time on visually striking tracks.



Focus on finding the perfect line as you accelerate through tunnels on the edge of a nebula or drift smoothly through the curves of a storage facility.

Inspired by precision movement games such as Surf, SpaceRace features a global leaderboard of lap times around famous racetracks reimagined and novel circuits.



These icons represent the four functions of your ship's PowerUnit: accelerating, decelerating, strafing and shields.
Over time your ship generates power that can be deployed to give them a temporary Boost.
Whether you're using every last bit of track to stop deep into a braking zone or unleashing all your boost and hitting maximum velocity as you hurtle toward the line, tactically using your energy is essential to a rapid lap time.

Designed to be played to your favourite music with a minimalist soundtrack of clicks, pops and the gentle rumble of your PowerUnit, SpaceRace offers relaxing gameplay for both short bursts and focused practicing.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12+
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600 (Graphic Drivers: NVIDIA 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12+
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon 3600 (Graphic Drivers: NVIDIA 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
